reviews_data.review_text: Great food options, lots of choices for seating areas. Dumpling Lady is the favorite so far, highly recommend the place. Will be back.

Moving from Florida, this building has me reminiscing Armature works in downtown tampa. Large historical building which has a wide selection of amazing restaurants with every type of food you would ever want.

Being from Orlando,. FL we don't have anything like this here. A good friend brought me here as he manages 2 of the restaurants in Optimist Hall. This is one of the coolest places I have been to. If you want an amazing selection of different types of foods and support small businesses and be part of a lively atmosphere...this is the place to check out.
Great variety of food options and lots of seating in and outdoors. Great for remote work or meet ups.
Fabulous variety of food and shops, too much to choose from and not enough space in the tummy, something for everyone.
The atmosphere alone is worth the trip to see this place. Great food. Great vibe. We sat outside and it was beautiful.
Love this place.  Great vibe and great food.  An excellent place to have some social time
Always busy and always great. Love the options and atmosphere
there's something here for everyone, even my grandmother found a place that would just give her some avocado and cucumber. the sushi place is my fav!
Lots of options for food and a nice, safe environment.

I was thoroughly impressed by the variety of food options and overall atmosphere. The hall was bustling with energy and there was a great mix of cuisines to choose from. Great for families and friends and ,casual date nights. In addition to the great food, the indoor and outdoor seating area was comfortable and there was lively atmosphere with music playing in the background. Overall I had a great experience at Optimist hall and will definitely be returning to try food from other vendors.
(Translated by Google) Excellent variety, food from all over the world, clean and friendly  (Original) Excelente variedad, comida de todo el mundo, limpio y agradable

I love this place! I can eat anything that I want at the same place. Got a ticket last time. There is a new rule that never was implemented before, if you stay longer than 2 hours, so watch out! Don't park in an area close to the restaurants.
This place has something for everyone, from candy to cacti, from sushi to stationery, it's such a fun place to explore, my favorite restaurants there are Enat and Botiwalla
Very nice place to hang out get together with friends...and explore different cultures of food,and shopping.

so many food spots to pick from! we had dumplings and a burger but we were so hungry those didn't get photographed 😀 but the steak empanada from Felix's was amazing and the mac and cheese from papi queso were okay! Drinks from the bar were also good!!
An extremely cool food hall! I love that everyone can get something different! It a wonderful place for trying lots of food. Also a great place to go before a concert for cheaper food and drinks!

This is a great place with many food options, plenty of seating inside and out, and also a plant shop. Some of the cuisine includes Asian, Mexican, American, coffee, and sweets. I had the fried dumplings from The dumpling Lady. I really enjoyed it. I also had Gelato at the Gelato place and they had many great flavors to choose from. This is a great place to visit when visiting Charlotte.

This is a great spot to meet a friend.  It's a neat space with good atmosphere.  There are lots of choices for any craving.  Prices are a little higher than one would expect for ordering at a counter.  Parking is NOT good.  Carpool or plan to spend some time circling like a shark.

Great food options - but kind of expensive. Seating is a bit difficult if you go during busy hours (i.e. fri/sat/sun). The double bummer is the fact that you have to pay for parking if you stay longer than 1.5 hours. Good spot for tourists or if you haven't already - but as a local, it's not on my frequents list.
Really cool spot.  Had lunch at The Dumpling Lady and it was terrific!!!

Stopped by on the way to Charlotte Douglass for a quick bite.  What a delightful surprise this hall is. Many international options.  Had empanadas, bao buns, and ice cream, all top notch.  The airport and surrounding area is a God-foresaken hellscape, so get a bite of happiness here before you drive over...
Good Vibes Good food
Great food selection! Trendy fun with the fam.
Love this place.  It's like a grown up, sophisticated cafeteria.  Tons of good food and drink options.  Clean inside with private areas to sit.
Great food, lots of choices, good atmosphere..
Great place with a wide variety of options for food.
Enjoyed the variety of walk ups available.
Lots of outdoor seating.  Loved Fonta Flora brewery.  Great beers and nice people.

Cool place to eat, drink, and hang out. I should note that the outdoor sitting is surrounded by the building itself, so it feels safe and private. There is also a shop with amazing indoor plants in the hall.

Great food and atmosphere.   Showed up at 1:09 pm on 12/30/22..... texted laz parking the minute we got there....received a parking violation at 1:49 regardless of registration with laz parking.   Such a huge pain to have to dispute a parking violation to enjoy an hour at the food court.   Would be so much better without the parking vultures

Great place to hangout, shop and eat.  Check out the website for directory of restaurants before coming and it'll help you narrow things down.  Parking can be challenging but it is free.  I think the new parking rules indicate that it's free for the first 90 minutes and then it becomes more expensive the longer you are there.

Wow. To many restaurants to name. I visited Papi Queso. It was amazing 👏 You can find any cuisine you desire with wines and lounge seating to enjoy the atmosphere. If you are looking for a relaxing, hunger fulfilling venue that you can take your kids on any day. This is your spot. Thank me later.

Great place and a ton of food and drink options. Has a young vibe to it and tons of parking. Charlotte must hang. Update 2022 December: still a fantastic place but the parking prices are just disappointing. They are hawkish on offenders. Be cautious to pay per schedule posted on the lots to avoid expensive citation.
Optimist Hall is a fusion of different food and cultures, a great place to check out!
Lots of places to eat
Good food lots to choose from. Good place to hang out! Outdoor seating area!

We enjoyed having lunch at Optimus Park however the Parking company Laz Parking is confusing and we ended up paying for parking when Optimus Park offers 90 min free.  We contacted Laz Parking and they refused to cancel the charge. They admitted they had many patrons contacting them for the same reason.
A CROWDED CLUSTER****

(Translated by Google) I love this place you find everything, different types of food, drinks, dessert and more  (Original) Me encanta este lugar encuentras de todo, diferente tipos comidas, bebidas, postre y más
Amazing selection of food options. Great atmosphere just be patient to find seating.
I tried Dumpling Lady again. I still don't get what all the hype is. I did get an ice cream at Honeysuckle and it was Delish!!!
Loved it
Loved the many different ethnic food options. It was very hard to choose. Looking forward to visiting again, hopefully in warmer weather.
Very nice area. Will definitely return and recommend.
It's easily my favorite place to eat in the city.
Great local spot with tons of good food options
Very fancy

Optimist hall is one of my favorite places for many reasons. There is a good variety of food choices. As a REALTOR it's a nice spot to work away from home or to meet clients. Check this place out if you haven't already.
Very cool, lots a choices!
I have always loved this place. There are so many options to choose from. The atmosphere is iconic.
Lots of great options that are reasonably priced. Suggested by friends as the first place to visit once we moved to Charlotte!
Why can't these be in every city?
A delightful find in Charlotte. So many quality restaurants in one location with great vibes and patio space.

I always have a great time. The food and drinks are great.  The atmosphere is casual.  I can come anytime and enjoy myself with friends or by myself self. I hate it cost to park. I  just have to be aware of my time.  Overall good.
One word - variety! So many , many tasty food choices and it feels like something for everyone
Fun place there is something for everyone here.Everyone enjoyed their food
Tons of variety here but parking was horrendous.
Many options to choose from. The food is tasty and quality.
You must visit this place, there are so many choices. I like to get a few things from different places and eat in the public area.
Velvet Taco and the dumplings were amazing!!!!!
I love the food courts like this
A wonderful place to go
Great variety of food from around the world. Tip: order online and pickup to skip the line.
Really fresh face on the 20th century food court concept; kinda like food court meets food trucks. Great variety of American & International foods.

Optimist Hall is exactly as it advertises, "a food hall complemented by retail, restaurants, and creative offices." My family and I went in search of a restaurant called Papi Queso, a gourmet grilled cheese spot. And they did not disappoint. I had the Philly cheese steak grilled cheese with the garlic parmesan tots. My son and his girlfriend had the Buffalo grilled chicken and tots. Because it's a food hall, you order your food and then find seating around the beautiful establishment. There are indoor and outdoor seating options. They give you a buzzer and give an estimated time of 15 minutes, but the food was ready before 15 min. It's all made fresh to order. My Philly grilled cheese was so ooey and gooey, it had that amazing cheese pull. The bread had the perfect outer crunch but soft inside. The tots come with a aoili for dipping. I was not a fan of the sauce but I am still dreaming about those tots. The butter sauce drizzled over these hot deep fried tots with the parmesan and garlic is everything. But if a grilled cheese is not what you want there are many other places to choose from. If I lived in Charlotte I would definitely go back to Optimist Hall and try more restaurants. Highly recommended!

Beware of the parking! They have poor signage indicating you have to pay for parking. We are from out of town and there was no sign at the entrance or at the parking space to indicate we had to pay for parking. Came back to a ticket on my car. Had to pay online with a service fee with no option to pay by mail. Very disappointed in what could have otherwise been a good experience.
Great gem!
Delicious variety of shops, just on the pricier end
I absolutely love this place. The Dumpling Lady is not to be missed. The Gelato  shop is Devine.
so many food, drink, & fun options!

I went to Charlotte and stopped by this place for a bite to eat. I was blown away by the different choices of cuisine. From Indian to Asian this place has you covered. There's also a large bar inside that sells wine and beer.  After walking around, I decided on Velvet Taco. I ordered the grilled salmon taco.  I was very impressed. It was full of spice and flavor. I didn't take a picture because I was so hungry.  Note: You have to pay to park at Optimist Hall.
Gostei. Um local interessante.  (Translated by Google) Liked it. An interesting place.
Nice dining experience with several different cuisines to choose from.
Absolutely Love the place has so many different types of food that you can have here. Definitely would recommend going on a weekday versus the weekend because it tends to get more busy
Great selection of vendors. Extra seating will be helpful.
Several food places with delicious foods! Seating can be difficult at times.

Beware that after 90 minutes parking isn't free, and they will fine you $24 otherwise. There are a couple of signs in the entire parking lot with info, with no indication of where to pay or how. So, LAZ parking is just waiting to get you. Won't be back to this location until they fix this trap or add signs at each parking spot so ppl don't get fines.
Such a fun spot

Love this place, great food options, bars, ambiance and easy parking which is free for the first hour & a half (rare in CLT).  We love papi queso, dumpling lady, and mezeh, and the spindle bar!  It can get pretty busy but we've never waited more than 25 mins for our food, seating can get tricky as it's like a large food court but it's not too hard to find seating and all the food is WORTH IT!
Great place to eat so everyone can have a different choice. Enjoyed eating out on deck on a warm day. A treat on a Charlotte visit!

Wonderful selection of food and sweet treats. Our favorite is Botiwalla, Indian street food. You can't beat the choices if you have a large group who can't decide. We love the setting in the old textile mill building.
Truly enjoyed our visit. So many delicious food options and variety. Fun environment and friendly service. Had a great time with our family.
Good food go everyone and every ethnicity.
So many food choices they even serve vegan food from the 2 places I ordered the food was excellent the places my family ordered from food was excellent drinks 🍸 are a little expensive but still good
It's a mall, but mainly about good food, drinks, and a great atmosphere. What's not to love?
Good place for food
Amazing variety and quality of food. Parking is a mess.

Incredible. There's over ten options for food and they text you when it's ready to pick up and you sit anywhere in the building with various picnic tables, cozy chairs, couches, and Barstool areas. Such a great place to hang out. The coffee was sublime and the staff at Suarez were top notch.
Great selection, tried one of the brown ales, was delish!
Great place to walk around. We ate at Mezeh Mediterranean Grill. Our 'bowls" were so tasty! Definitely going back there again

Very cute scenery! You must go while it's still christmas. Some of the best restaurants are Velvet Taco and Suárez, but everything there is really tasty. I had a Cubano Sandwich from Suárez, and it is one of the best Cubans I've ever tried! You also must go to Billy Sunday. They have the cutest Christmas pop up with really good holiday drinks! Tonight was a movie night, where my friends and I sipped some sugar cookie martinis!
My favorite place to eat in Charlotte. Lots of choices for people who may not necessarily want to eat the same type of food.
So many options in one place! So very cool!
Nice place with lots of variety of cuisines and food options
Lots of good good options and vibe.

What a unique place to come when you have different good tastes and diet restrictions. Vegans, vegetarians, meat conassieur, kids, senior citizens, all will find something that interests them in this fabulous facility. 0 out of 10 stars for seating though. We had to post up table watchers to find a seat for our big family.
Reduce arguments. When you and your SO can't decide where to eat THIS is the place to go to.

I can't get enough of Optimist hall. Not only do they have healthy options they also have a cool coworking space to work in alone or with your team. This is one of my favorite meeting spots to visit and have lunch.
Great atmosphere, great food selection, and a great place to gather with friends. Security is always waking around.
Great selection, great atmosphere... Good value for the high quality products that were offered
I love this place ❤️  they have so many  options when it comes to food and more . 10/10
This place is great. There are so many food choices for everyone through many different merchants.
Rating based purely on the new parking regulations. Patrons are already here to spend money… guess everything is a money grab nowadays
First time here. Got the best Brussel sprouts

This was my third attempt to visit. Twice I came, midweek, and it was super crowded that I couldn't find parking anywhere amount the seemingly ample sprawling parking areas. Plus, be aware there is a charge for parking which must be paid through an app on a smart phone, but the first 90 mins are free. This time I lucked up on a space as someone was pulling out. Once inside, it was a cornucopia of eateries and socializing areas. I pre-ordered food at The Dumpling Lady, authentic Chinese dumplings. It was "meh". However, I really enjoyed the atmosphere a converted industrial warehouse building with rustic decor, Indoor and outdoor seating and socializing areas, just a great vibe. Probably even better in warmer weather when the outdoors would be more enjoyable. I considered coming back with my bf or my ladies group but I just wondered how I could make that happen since the Biggest issue for me was that it was just sooooo crowded and it was a Thursday at 2:30pm... I cannot imagine what it would be like during prime time on the weekend?? Good luck, pack your patience though and ENJOY!
Fun place with lots of food and drink options
Can't agree on lunch? Go to Optimist Hall! There are so many amazing places to eat here. You can choose between almost any cultural food here. Pizza, Bao, BBQ, Sushi, and more! Check it out!

I'm still learning the area, but I was told about this spot and since I had family in town for Thanksgiving- why not check it out. I did get a ticket....parking wasn't clear. But we had a little bit of everything from sushi down to the grill cheese place. Sorry I don't have pictures. I do however have a picture of my drink from one of the bars 👍🏾. I will definitely be going back.
You will find many options when it comes to eating in this place, ranging from food from various countries and/or continents, Asia, Africa, Europe, Latin America and America.
Good place.
Huge selection of ethnic foods. We had the pho and it was delicious. Prices are not cheap like a mall food court but I thought more of a gourmet selection. Free parking for first 90 minutes.
What an amazing spot to grab food. The Ethiopian foodspot Enat was bussing 😩😩😩
Great variety of food venues under one roof. Asian, Latin, Indian, BBQ, Pizza, and more. Inside and outside casual dining. It's a meeting place! We love it!
So much food to choose from. If I could take a day to stay here, I would try everything
Many choices of good foods from multiple merchants.
Love the food and cocktail options at Optimist Hall. Best kept secret is the Ethiopian menu among others.
Visited Charlotte and I asked around for a unique place to eat. Great atmosphere and unique food items. My only complaint is the limited indoor seating but there was ample outdoor seating.
Did a lot of looking, everyone ordered what the wanted and the Butter Chicken that I got was amazing! Forgot to take pictures.
Loved it

Quite the selection of restaurants (also a paper shop and a plant store) to be found in this place. It's kind of like someone decided that a mall should just be a giant food court with a lot better food choices.
We went there for lunch. Very cool place. Lots of food choices & seating was inside or outside. Great place to take the kiddos. Will go back when I'm in town again.
(Translated by Google) I recommend good food and variety 👌  (Original) Recomiendo buena comida y variedad 👌
Many options
The food and the vendors were awesome!!! Very attentive and loved talking to you! 10 for 10 would recommend!
We enjoyed our visit there, 1st time!! Nice selection of food and there was plenty of seating. We did go off hours and from what I understand it's packed in the evenings and weekends
This place was so much fun and had a lot of good food options. There is something here for everyone.
Sooo much to see and eat here! Great outdoor space as well!!!
Good number of food options...plus some cute retailers. Parking can be not fun during busy times.

Beware!!! They changed their parking rules and do not give clear indications to customers about how to pay in order not to receive a citation. They tell you you have to pay $5 if you stay longer than 90 min and $18 if longer than 3 hours. Cool no problem… except that when you text the number to start to pay they tell you don't pay now .. you pay after the 90 min .. so one would assume you pay at the end of your stay the amount corresponding w how much time you actually spent there.. except noo that would be too reasonable. They fine you $20 for not paying the $5 right AFTER 90 mjn is exhausted .. regardless of whether you end up staying beyond 3 hours .. it's ridiculous, nonsensical but worse than that .. it sets the consumer up for failure because the instructions given are not clear. They even have parking attendants writing down people's licenses in addition to their automated system . It's very poorly run so I definitely won't be going back any time soon! Juliet Galton
Great food but pricey!!

My Experience here ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ We took the kids to Optimist Hall tonight so we can have a bunch of different options for dinner.  It's all about the experience and vibe of the place that makes it so cool for everyone.  #5Star
I was spoiled for choice here.
Gooood

Overall this place is very cool and it has a very wide range of food. It is a little on the spendy side for what it is, but in Charlotte you come to expect it. The parking is why I'm only giving three stars. I had read about the parking prior so there was some pre-worry because of all the bad reviews. Here is how it works: you park, text a number and it tells you to check back in to pay after 90 minutes... There is no reminder mind you. You can use the parking meter but the only option there is to pay like you're staying past 90 minutes. The worst part is you see parking attendants circling the parking lots just waiting to write a ticket... I got to my car at 85 minutes and someone was standing there waiting to put the ticket on my car. What a joke.
Great place to eat and have drinks, several types of restaurants and beer brewers lots of seats and good bathrooms

My kids loved this place. It was our first time and loved all the choices of food. And the outside space is fabulous. It can be overwhelming to pick a place to eat because there are so many options. I have tried several of the restaurants and they are good.
Nice place. Just be prepared with your credit card as many locations do not accept cash. Also note early morning there are only 2 shops open before 9 am.

The food is good if you're not personally related to the cuisine it serves. For example, as an Indian, you'll find their Indian cuisine restaurant to be quite americanized and not authentic. Same goes for the other cuisines. Finding a seat is a nightmare, and if you're traveling in a group, definitely get a part of the group to scout out chairs to sit in once you get the food. If you're into food that's midly spiced (both flavor and heat) go for it.  Parking is changing, it's paid parking now. Parking is $5 for first hour and $3 for each hour after that. Seems like a lot for something that looks like a mall food court.

One of the most popular places in Charlotte! Lots of variety between shops, eats, and drinks. Great atmosphere, and views of the city. Can get very busy on weekends making finding a spot to park and eat difficult.
Good variety of cuisine.
Great food with a ton of choice. The Indian food place was absolutely incredible.
A great variety of food and good food at that
Awesome place!
Best Ethiopian food 😋
Awesome selection and food. Had a couple of empanadas and they were amazing. Parking and lines were a bit of a challenge.
Highly recommend the juicy lucy and blackcherry soda at Harriet's Hamburger

Really cool spot. We will definitely be back here the next time we are Charlotte. So many great-looking food shops! It can be a little busy on the weekend, and it can take a few minutes to find a parking spot, but it is worth it.

So frustrating Charlotte bulldozed most of it's buildings. Thrilled that the developers had the sense to revitalize this one. It's definitely one of the best places in Charlotte. It's like Ponce City Market in Atlanta (on a smaller scale)
Lots of food options.
Lots of options, good for allergy needs and dietary preferences. Awesome vibe. Little pricey but good quality

My family loves coming to optimist hall when we can't decide what to eat for lunch/ dinner. The environment is great. There's something for everyone, and the plant and paper goods places are a nice bonus. I do wish there could be one or two more "goods" places aside from food.
Great place to find amazing food and drinks and coffee and dessert! Be careful you need to call a number after u park
Fun experience with lot of food options. Botiwala has some of the best Indian food options.
A fantastic project for our city
Wow!  Try the lobster roll at the sushi place!

Cool place to visit until you go back into your car and find a parking ticket, no where did it say you had to pay for parking no signs nothing to point out I need to pay at a quiosco or anything but yeah we received a  fine for not paying for parking without even knowing I needed too! Also spent a good chunk of money trying all the different food they had to offer ! But sour ending
My spot! Love it here!!!
Everything you could want in one spot. It's a very cool place
Muy bonito lugar, ambiente agradable, variedad de comida internacional  (Translated by Google) Very nice place, nice atmosphere, variety of international food
Always amazing!! Dumpling Lady is the best there is,period!!
Place was great
Variety of food to choose from.

Did someone say world food tour?? What a great way to transform an industrial area. Absolutely amazing food court venue with many choices for large groups and for those indecisive members of your party. Many indoor and outdoor seating options were present. Free parking is also available. Large party friendly. Loved this spot. Check it out.

Watch out for parking!  Optimist Hall has instituted a new policy that you have to pay if you stay more than 90 minutes.  I saw absolutely no signs for this, and there do not appear to be any pay stations, but I received a parking ticket.  I'm not sure how it makes sense to chase people away from a venue that can make more money by people lingering and continuing to purchase.  I will look for other options before I return, and there are a lot of other options.

Optimist Hall is a must-go food court if you are traveling or even if you live in Charlotte. The vibe of the place is just absolutely amazing and the wide selection of food, drinks, and desserts will surprise you. The only bad thing is that almost all restaurants only accept cards. Yeah, no cash accepted :(
A must visit!!!
There are very good restaurants there and The atmosphere is amazing 🤩
Absolutely fantastic place - a mall of amazing places to eat.   A little busy, a little short on seating, but really, that didn't matter- it was wonderful overall.
JUST AMAZING. Period.
Everyone must go here if visiting Charlotte! So many food choices, a great social for groups or singles! Downstairs has music .absolutely friendly, welcoming atmosphere!
Becoming a regular hangout of mine
Great dinning experience

Optimist Hall is an open air, variety eating and fellowship experience.   There are tons of different restaurants, cafes, drinks, etc.  even stuff for pets.  We ate at the Street Indian Restaurant Botiwalla.   Delicious lamb burger and spicy veggie roll.  Huge outdoor area for eating, hanging out and a place for kids to play.

Always a great experience.  A few of my faves- anything from the grilled cheese place, tres leches cake, chicken and waffles taco from velvet tacos, salmon bowl from the sushi place, samosas and tibs from the Ethiopian place, and the light and airy appetizers from the Indian place.  Don't forget the plant shop in the back. Very knowledgeable and friendly staff.

10/10 - if you're contemplating going, just do it! This place truly has something for everyone. Really good vegan options and beautiful scenery. I went two days back to back and I do not regret it. Dumpling Lady - amazing vegan dumplings Bao and Broth - ramen was amazing! I was so sad when it finished lol Pet Wants - Super cute & affordable treats! Zukku - Poke bowls are delectable + you get a very large portion

Great place to go to hand out with friends or family. Especially great if your group can't agree on where to eat and for the food adventurist. Warehouse building is two stories of different food and beverage booths, everything from burgers to gelato, Ethiopian, Indian, stone fired pizzas, dumplings, Mediterranean and so much more! All local and artisan businesses. Definitely go here if you're in Charlotte.
1 star for employing laz parking and leaching off the community that supports optimist hall. If you pay their citations you're paying the parking company, not the city.
If you haven't been .what are you waiting  for .great place good food
Really cool place to hangout
Not a handicap friendly setup - limited access & parking. Otherwise, food options are delicious.
There is everything for everyone, but definitely try Papi Queso's garlic tots. They're something else!
Such a beautiful place and full of history.
I'm a big fan of this place. The Ethiopian food is delicious. Lots of good choices. I would love to see more vegan food options & locally made spirits at the bar.

Honestly it's an ok vibe to hangout with friends, lots to do definitely, bars, food, they even have romantic places to just dine and chill, the food was good, I had a taco and tried some other items, it was good
I loved 👍👍
Dumpling place was good 👍
Parking is a joke. 25 bucks for a little over 2 hours. Food was good but not worth the parking hassle.

I used to love going there... they have the best burgers and I like El thrifty, however now they charge $25 for parking the place is always crowded and its hard to find a table to sit and enjoy your food...
Amazing Food Everywhere
Every city needs a site like this!
Service and food were great. Having live entertainment by Greg Steinfeld made the day perfect!
Great place.
Always bring guests here. A favorite for sure. We had Enat Ethiopian this time and it was out of the world!

This place is made of 110% superlative. Every food item I have tasted was gustatory heaven, the physical location is beautiful (particularly at night), and the staff of every single establishment are warm, welcoming, and brimming with enthusiasm. It felt like instant friendship. I will definitely be back every chance l get.
This place is so cute and clean and has so much different cuisine!
Where old world factory meets modern eatery heaven!  If you don't find a place to eat here you're not hungry!
We love this food hall! The building and outdoor space is beautiful, and the selection of vendors is amazing.
Awesome selection of different cuisine and drinks.  Unique interactive layout with lots of fun to be had. This is one to check out!
So many great food stands!
Fantastic, Fantastic, Fantastic. You will NOT be disappointed. Explore, Eat & Enjoy.
Suarez bakery is amazing!!
You have to pay for the parking lot and you can't even see the signs that tell you that... they give you a really big fine.
Great place to hang out with amazing restaurants.
Parking can be a headache here. Other than that its a really vibramt spot with cool laidback vibes.

It's always great when I go, it would just be a little bit better if there were a few more clear directions on where the location you need would be.. other than that everything else seems great, prices are sometimes a little bit high but everything is great 😇
What s great place! Tina of good interesting food choices and a lovely spot to sit outside!! Highly recommend it!

The atmosphere was great. However I felt that how good the food options were largely depends on what you got. The taco place was great and I enjoyed Wooden Robot!  However the ice cream place had one good and one bad flavour, and was disappointed that the ramen noodles and broth were sold separately. I would give my experience food wise 7/10 but the experience overall a 9/10. I'll plan to visit more places next time I go to get a better sense.
Great selection of food choices.
Great atmosphere!  Plenty of choices for food.  Have your comfort food or try something new.  Chill outside or find a table inside.  Great for all ages!
I absolutely love this place. The environment is great and the retail and food selections are awesome.
Love to go here try different foods. Big fan of Boxcar Betty's, Felix's Empanadas, Harriett's
The place has so many choices.  Decided for Indian and it was delicious 😋 will be back
(Translated by Google) Lots of variety of food from different places  (Original) Mucha variedad de comida de diferentes lugares
Love it. Great atmosphere, variety of places to eat.

This place is amazing and overwhelming! But in a good way! There are literally so many food options that it can appeal to even the pickiest of eaters! Seating can be hard to come by but they have enough scattered around.

Traveled there with a group of 16 of us, by train, how enjoyable, we traveled from Oakland, CA  and as far as Maryland, the choices were outstanding and the atmosphere although crowded we didn't care, it was fantastic, will visit again since I live in the Charlotte Area.
Great atmosphere, clean and a large variety of foods and a few bars.
There's too much good food and drink to choose from! Don't forget to check out the boutiques, the plant store is pretty neat!
Fun environment.  Nice selection of eateries.  Pricing can be a bit high. Definitely, will visit again in the future.
Lots of fun and unique options. Lots of outdoor and some good indoor seating as well.
Almost too much to choose from here! It is very pricey so brig your wallet, but we didn't find a thing we didn't enjoy.
Wonderful selection of food venues and unique retail offerings.

PROS: This place has a great vibe! Also, has a great variety of different foods that taste great! The food is kinda expensive but it's worth the variety. My only CON would be that the drinks are very expensive and are also small. So if your looking for a place to get multiple drinks this is probably not the best option.  Fav place: Boa and Broth
Love the variety!! So many to choose from and such a cool spot!
Great place with loads of options for food. The ambience is great. The only problem is finding a parking spot. Overall a good hangout place for weekends.
Nice little place to eat when in Charlotte NC
Great place. Soooooo many options. I ordered from several places and none of them disappointed. Great place for groups since there is variety. Highly recommend this place!
Great place to go when you unsure what you want to eat. Can even grab a treat for your dog.

My wife, daughter, and I come here often. When we have friends or family in town, we make sure to come here because there is such a variety of food. The parking is great even though they recently started charging to park there. The only thing I don't really like are the drinks inside of Optimist Hall, as they are sometimes pre-mixed, and the taste can be kind of offensive. Overall, I love this place, and will continue to come here!
Such a vibe
Noble  Smoke was excellent . Great barbecue 😋
Bars and different restaurants all under one roof...nice place to explore... enjoy
You could find just about any cuisine in here that you may want. There was plenty of seating and a cool vibe with the renovated mill building.
Food court with restaurants selling different cuisines of food.
Great place to eat and drink with a wide variety of restaurants. Sad that they started charging for parking.
Never disappoints! Everyone gets what they want, no Arguing on where to go eat, and amazing ambiance.

Went for a birthday party; what a great idea! Lots of options for groups, makes transitions from dinner to drinks or dessert super easy. Pizza at Ava's is SO good. Spicy beef noodle soup at dumpling lady is something I dream about often. I want to try more places but I always end up at these 2. Committed to sushi and Harriet's burgers next time I kept seeing people bringing plates back from those 2 spots that made me drool.
Awesome.  Like going to a field of food trucks under roof.

A really cool place to eat at.  All different types of food, both inside and outside seating and a ton of parking. I had tacos which were really good and dumplings which were also very tasty. The price point was very reasonable. Very clean and everyone was friendly.
Awesome spot
Nice place
Delicious and unique options. Loved the Velvet Taco!

I loved it. Behind the Duke energy building, this place has multiple small venues to choose from, you have from bbq to vegan to ice cream and drinks, plant and dog gift shop. It is pet friendly, easy to find parking, and great option to go out with your friend or a date night. There is a place for everyone!
Lots of awesome food choices and cool environment
Love this place. Awesome atmosphere and food is bomb
(Translated by Google) It was excellent!  (Original) Estuvo excelente!
Recently was in CTL and we had to check this place out after hearing about it from friends. What an incredible dinning concept with an amazing atmosphere.  Lots of food choices.
Lots of choices, for food and beer.  Ample outside sitting.  Parking is a bit of a pain but doable
I love the food choices here and the vibe.
great place to spend time with friends
Great experience I would recommend a family outing here

What a cool place! All kinds of businesses in here: food, coffee, candy, stationary, plants; really, you name it! You can tell it's a local haunt for nearby office workers. We came around lunch, and it seems there are enough places for there not to be too much of a wait anywhere.

Restaurant mall.  Variety Variety Variety!Great place for extroverts during lunch hour (11a-3p) and great place for introverts there after (about 3-6ish pm). Ate at Harriet's Hamburgers; it's a must try!  Simple menu, made to order hamburgers (or cheese) and fries in nice proportions (I could have split it with a friend and still be satiated).  The pop (HH must've originated in the Midwest) taste homemade (I had black cherry...yum!)  and you can get a refill!  In case you're interested, it set me back $16 but I'd definitely do it again.
Delicious food for any taste!

Love this place; there is something for everyone here. I love getting a dumplings from one place, tacos from another and ice cream from a third and eating right in the center of that food court and hanging out. El Thrifty is also a good option if you want a fun Mexican sit down restaurant with fun games for after!

(Translated by Google) Wow, a mega food court in the best industrial atmosphere! Great food great drinks from Indian tandori to dumplings to gelato. Inside and outside, all thumbs up!  (Original) Wow, ein megafoodcourt in bester Industrieromatik-Athmosphäre! Tolles Essen, tolle Drinks von indischen Tandori über Dumplings bis zu Gelato. Drin und Draußen, alle Daumen hoch!
Great place to go hang out. Lots of selection
Great spot with great food. There's something for everyone!
Awesome burger, great crowd!!!
If you are hungry don't come here. Cheese wasn't melted chai wasn't good my glass had lipstick on it and i paid 21 dollars for a vickies bag of chips essentially
I love the variety of food options at Optimist Hall.
This is a cool open facility with lots of options for food, drinks and fun! Easy access to the light rail too. Great for families and couples.
Suarez restaurant offered great food and outstanding customer service. Thank You!
Great choices of food

Very disappointing! Their is no way to tell where each establishment is located! I would of really liked to see the old fashioned candy store .You just have to walk around and see which not everyone is capable of doing that ! Some people have health issues that prevent them from doing so . Speaking of health problems not everyone can be around smoke/second hand smoke! Their really should be a area for people to sit outside where smokers won't be blowing smoke in your face!
Awesome food and atmosphere.  Need more shops.
If you want trendy... If you want 'spensive... If you want to eat in a 150 year old building... You can find all that and more at Optimist Hall.
Lots of great food, shops and a great atmosphere
Great variety of food and nice atmosphere.
A cacophony of small counter vendors offering a wide variety of ethnic based and fusion foods, with some local favorites as well.  The Fonta Flora Brew Pub on site was an awesome Bonus!
Best place for food hopping
Great atmosphere.   So many places to eat!

So many options.  Curiosity has been peaked!  Started with Suarez, and Empanadas today.  Fully enjoyed stretching my stretchy pants to the max, sampling the two establishments.  The hall is clean, modern. There's a good variety of options. I was told, it is structured in a way that there's not too much of an overlap in menu offerings. Lots of natural light. There's an outdoor courtyard in the middle of the hall that is dog friendly. I appreciated the hand washing station!  Will be visiting again, for sure!

This is an awesome place. There's a lot of cuisines to try out, you can even order online and pick-up without needing to wait in line. I tried Indian, Korean and Beer and all were pretty good. There's plenty of indoor and outdoor space and the place is pretty kid friendly too.  Parking is now paid but there's a lot of space and it's free for the first 90 mins
Super modern food court. We only tried The Dumpling Lady- Dan Dan Noodles & Chicken/Shrimp Dumplings. Definitely will explore more on our next trip.
Great meeting spot. Open spaces, plenty of seating (indoor and outdoor), variety of food options, plenty of paid parking (first 90 min complimentary)

Awesome! Lots to choose from! The Indian street food was really good! First time I've tried it and I'll be back! Thank you! 😊 Also, someone lost a small change purse in the restroom and I turned it over to security. He says it will be in the lost and found. Had an ID in it. Definitely belongs to a hispanic female...
My sister and I had lunch here again and as always it was amazing we love the atmosphere and the food
(Translated by Google) I like their breakfasts  (Original) Me gustan sus desayunos
A lot of variety. Can get crowded real quick, so get here early!
Getting better all the time
I love it here! I hope they make more like this.
Best restaurants in a beautiful setting.
Good food

The ambiance is cool, casual, and chill. Lots of nice seating areas. Good variety of restaurants and shops. Ample parking space. You receive texts when your order is ready, which is convenient. And the food is awesome! 10/10
Like the variety of restaurants and the shops
Mediterranean is the best
(Translated by Google) Good variety of dishes and places  (Original) Buena variedad de platillos y lugares
**AS A DELIVERY DRIVER I love doing pick-ups from here. Every restaurant that I pick-up from is always courteous and professional and different smells of food is so tempting.

It was my first time visiting Charlotte. Decided to have lunch here and it did not disappointment. There's a wide variety of food and shops here. It's essentially a food dining hall. Optimist offers both indoor and outdoor seating. We enjoyed it so much, we went back a 2nd time during our 5 day stay in Charlotte. Parking is free for the first 90 minutes :)
Awesome selection of food! Definitely recommend!!! ⭐
This is an awesome spot, can be used as a hang out or a date night, plenty of drink options and food, phenomenal atmosphere and dog friendly, so you can bring your four legged family members
The vibes are great. Food was amazing. I ate at the pizza spot! Definitely can't wait to go back
Cool place
Very good variety and service throughout the building.
This place is really great. They have so many different options that there is something for everyone. Everything I have tried so far has been delicious
Great place! Great variety of food. Wonderful place for families, a date or even just to hang out with friends.
Average food
Dis place ist so cool ja! Must come back.
